text:
Adele fans unite for tribute performances after singer cancels concerts last minute

A trend #SingforAdele was prominent on Twitter, with fans showing support and love to the 'Someone Like You' crooner

Adele says she hasn’t felt depressed since giving birth. PHOTO: FILE
title: Adele fans unite for tribute performances after singer cancels concerts last minute
